mutants.code:
def max_books_read(n, t, a):
    b = 1
    c_t = 0
    m = 0
    for i in range(n):
        c_t += a[i]
        while c_t > t:
            c_t -= a[b]
            b += 1
        m = max(m, i - b + 1)
    return m

    b = -1
    c_t = 0
    m = 0
    for i in range(n):
        c_t += a[i]
        while c_t > t:
            c_t -= a[b]
            b += 1
        m = max(m, i - b + 1)
    return m
